main.intro: HMU is the quickest way to say whatever you want, however you want, with new & close friends.
main.code_verify_hint: We sent you a code to verify your number.
main.verify_code_notice: CODE SHOULD AUTOMATICALLY BE ENTERED & GO TO NEXT SCREEN
main.notice: This will help us match you with more revelavant people.
main.nickname_hint: Your nick name will be used instead of your real name.
main.avatar_notice: This is how others will see you in the group.
main.premium_avtar_notice: This is a premium avatar. Upgrade to premiunm to unlock premium avatars and other cool features.
main.premium_modal_notice: The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes account settings. Please turn off at least 24 hours before the current period ends. Your iTunes Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. You can go to your iTunes Account to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew
main.see_users_just_from_your_country: See users just from your country
main.priority_support_from_the_reveal_team: Priority support from the reveal team
main.over18_dialog:
HMU is intended to only be used by users over the age of 18.

If you are younger than 18, please close and delete the app now
main.house_rules_dialog:
We are a pretty open bunch at reveal but we do have some rules to keep everyone happy and safe.

You must agree and follow these rules
main.dont_get_naked_dialog:
Feel free to be a little flirty but full frontal nudity is a big no no and is prohibited.

Your account will be banned if you dont comply
main.play_nicely_dialog:
If we find any aggressive, violent or inflammatory content your account will be removed and banned.

The HMU community is a safe and inclusive place
main.terms_of_use_dialog:
If we find any aggressive, violent or inflammatory content your account will be removed and banned.

The Reveal community is a safe and inclusive place
main.upgrade_to_premium: Upgrade to our premium plan and never worry about running out of HMUs again.
main.notifications_and_sounds_hint: Unlock Huddle using Touch ID, Face ID or your iOS device passcode
